text: (viśvāsavantayini! khella kapana avasthāvēdī) allāhgē nāmaya kiyanu nolæbū dæya oba āhārayaṭa noganu. niyata vaśayenma eya viśāla pāpayaki. (mehi) oba samaga tarka karana men niyata vaśayenma ṣeyitānvaru tamangē mituranva poḷam̆bavannāha. oba ovunṭa avanata vuvahot niyata vaśayenma obat (ovun men) samānayan tabā namadinneki
